About Me Work

Work

  • UX/UI Design, Design Direction & Front-end Dev

    Stackla Widgets

    By moving from a static-dimensioned, rigidly-designed iFrame solution to a responsive, easily customisable Javascript-embedded solution, the Stackla Widgets became the best selling feature of the product.

    Stackla Widgets

  • UX/UI Design, Design Direction & Front-end Dev

    Stackla Admin

    The Stackla Admin allows clients to aggregate and curate their content, and edit their displays. Continual user testing combined with a minimal design led to massive improvements of usability, even as the product's features grew rapidly.

    Stackla Admin

  • Web Design & Front-end Dev

    True Skate

    True Skate was a #1 game on the Apple App Store in 70 countries. We used a Stackla Widget to create a microsite that would promote the brand's social media, engage users to post their own content, and drive sales.

    True Skate

  • Front-end Dev

    Manchester United

    The Manchester United social hub allows fans to see all the content being produced by the club in one place. It's an international site, serving multiple languages.

    Manchester United

  • Front-end Dev

    Asia's Next Top Model

    Built to support the TV show and promote social engagement after each week's program. A custom Wordpress theme built from scratch to suit the client's designs.

    Asia's Next Top Model

  • Web Design & Front-end Dev

    Myer

    A number of Stackla Widgets were built to support the livestream of the Myer Spring Summer 2015 Fashion Launch.

    Myer

  • Design and coding

    Melody Chord and Rhythm

    A multi-touch application created as part of my Information Visualisation course at university

    Melody Chord and Rhythm
